verses.verse: Οὐδὲν <WG3762> Ouden no ( Walking by the Spirit) ἄρα <WG686> ara Therefore , νῦν <WG3568> nyn [there is] now κατάκριμα <WG2631> katakrima condemnation τοῖς <WG3588> tois for those who [are] ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus . ( BYZ and TR in Christ Jesus, who do not walk according to the flesh but according to the Spirit.)

ὁ <WG3588> ho the γὰρ <WG1063> gar For νόμος <WG3551> nomos law τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit τῆς <WG3588> tēs of ζωῆς <WG2222> zōēs life ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus ἠλευθέρωσέν <WG1659> ēleutherōsen free σε <WG4771> se set you ( BYZ and TR me) ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τοῦ <WG3588> tou the νόμου <WG3551> nomou law τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias of sin καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοῦ <WG3588> tou - θανάτου <WG2288> thanatou death .

τὸ <WG3588> to what γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἀδύνατον <WG102> adynaton was powerless to do τοῦ <WG3588> tou the νόμου <WG3551> nomou law ἐν <WG1722> en in ᾧ <WG3739> hō that ἠσθένει <WG770> ēsthenei it was weakened διὰ <WG1223> dia by τῆς <WG3588> tēs the σαρκός <WG4561> sarkos flesh , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God [did] τὸν <WG3588> ton [own] ἑαυτοῦ <WG1438> heautou His Υἱὸν <WG5207> Huion Son πέμψας <WG3992> pempsas by sending ἐν <WG1722> en in ὁμοιώματι <WG3667> homoiōmati [the] likeness σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos man , ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias of sinful καὶ <WG2532> kai - περὶ <WG4012> peri [ as an offering ] for ἁμαρτίας <WG266> hamartias sin . ( Literally in the likeness of sinful flesh and for sin) κατέκρινεν <WG2632> katekrinen He [thus] condemned τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἁμαρτίαν <WG266> hamartian sin ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the σαρκί <WG4561> sarki flesh ,

ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that τὸ <WG3588> to the δικαίωμα <WG1345> dikaiōma righteous standard τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the νόμου <WG3551> nomou law πληρωθῇ <WG4137> plērōthē might be fulfilled ἐν <WG1722> en in ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us , τοῖς <WG3588> tois who μὴ <WG3361> mē do not κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to σάρκα <WG4561> sarka [the] flesh περιπατοῦσιν <WG4043> peripatousin walk ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma [the] Spirit .

Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi Those γὰρ <WG1063> gar - κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to σάρκα <WG4561> sarka [the] flesh ὄντες <WG1510> ontes who live τὰ <WG3588> ta on the things τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh ; φρονοῦσιν <WG5426> phronousin set their minds οἱ <WG3588> hoi those [who live] δὲ <WG1161> de but κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma [the] Spirit τὰ <WG3588> ta [set their minds on] the things τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the πνεύματος <WG4151> pneumatos Spirit .

τὸ <WG3588> to The γὰρ <WG1063> gar - φρόνημα <WG5427> phronēma mind τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh θάνατος <WG2288> thanatos [is] death , τὸ <WG3588> to the δὲ <WG1161> de but φρόνημα <WG5427> phronēma mind τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the πνεύματος <WG4151> pneumatos Spirit ζωὴ <WG2222> zōē [is] life καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἰρήνη <WG1515> eirēnē peace ,

διότι <WG1360> dioti because τὸ <WG3588> to the φρόνημα <WG5427> phronēma mind τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos flesh ἔχθρα <WG2189> echthra [is] hostile εἰς <WG1519> eis to Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God : τῷ <WG3588> tō to γὰρ <WG1063> gar - νόμῳ <WG3551> nomō law , τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God’s οὐχ <WG3756> ouch vvv ὑποτάσσεται <WG5293> hypotassetai It does not submit οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude nor γὰρ <WG1063> gar vvv δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can it [do so] .

οἱ <WG3588> hoi Those δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐν <WG1722> en controlled by σαρκὶ <WG4561> sarki [the] flesh ( Literally Those being in the flesh; similarly in verse 9) ὄντες <WG1510> ontes - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God . ἀρέσαι <WG700> aresai please οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv δύνανται <WG1410> dynantai cannot

Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis You , δὲ <WG1161> de however , οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐστὲ <WG1510> este are ἐν <WG1722> en controlled not by σαρκὶ <WG4561> sarki [the] flesh , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but ἐν <WG1722> en by πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati [the] Spirit , εἴπερ <WG1512> eiper if Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma [the] Spirit Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God οἰκεῖ <WG3611> oikei lives ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . εἰ <WG1487> ei if δέ <WG1161> de And τις <WG5100> tis anyone Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma [the] Spirit Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ , οὐκ <WG3756> ouk does not ἔχει <WG2192> echei have οὗτος <WG3778> houtos he οὐκ <WG3756> ouk does not ἔστιν <WG1510> estin belong αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou to [Christ] .

εἰ <WG1487> ei if δὲ <WG1161> de But Χριστὸς <WG5547> Christos Christ ἐν <WG1722> en [is] in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , τὸ <WG3588> to [your] μὲν <WG3303> men - σῶμα <WG4983> sōma body [is] νεκρὸν <WG3498> nekron dead διὰ <WG1223> dia because of ἁμαρτίαν <WG266> hamartian sin , τὸ <WG3588> to [your] δὲ <WG1161> de yet πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma spirit ζωὴ <WG2222> zōē [is] alive ( Or yet the Spirit is life) διὰ <WG1223> dia because of δικαιοσύνην <WG1343> dikaiosynēn righteousness .

εἰ <WG1487> ei if δὲ <WG1161> de And τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Him ἐγείραντος <WG1453> egeirantos who raised τὸν <WG3588> ton - Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus ἐκ <WG1537> ek from νεκρῶν <WG3498> nekrōn [the] dead οἰκεῖ <WG3611> oikei is living ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ὁ <WG3588> ho He who ἐγείρας <WG1453> egeiras raised «ἐκ <WG1537> ek from νεκρῶν» <WG3498> nekrōn [the] dead ( NA, BYZ, and TR raised Christ from the dead) Χριστὸν <WG5547> Christon Christ Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus ζωοποιήσει <WG2227> zōopoiēsei will also give life καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv τὰ <WG3588> ta - θνητὰ <WG2349> thnēta mortal σώματα <WG4983> sōmata bodies ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn to your διὰ <WG1223> dia through τοῦ <WG3588> tou who ἐνοικοῦντος <WG1774> enoikountos lives αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit , ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you .

( Heirs with Christ) Ἄρα <WG686> Ara Therefore οὖν <WG3767> oun . . . , ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , ὀφειλέται <WG3781> opheiletai [an] obligation , ἐσμέν <WG1510> esmen we have οὐ <WG3756> ou [but it is] not τῇ <WG3588> tē to the σαρκὶ <WG4561> sarki flesh , τοῦ <WG3588> tou - κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to σάρκα <WG4561> sarka [it] . ζῆν <WG2198> zēn to live

εἰ <WG1487> ei if γὰρ <WG1063> gar For κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to σάρκα <WG4561> sarka [the] flesh , ζῆτε <WG2198> zēte you live μέλλετε <WG3195> mellete you will ἀποθνήσκειν <WG599> apothnēskein die ; εἰ <WG1487> ei if δὲ <WG1161> de but πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati by [the] Spirit τὰς <WG3588> tas the πράξεις <WG4234> praxeis deeds τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the σώματος <WG4983> sōmatos body , θανατοῦτε <WG2289> thanatoute you put to death ζήσεσθε <WG2198> zēsesthe you will live .

ὅσοι <WG3745> hosoi all who γὰρ <WG1063> gar For Πνεύματι <WG4151> Pneumati by [the] Spirit Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God ἄγονται <WG71> agontai are led οὗτοι <WG3778> houtoi - υἱοί <WG5207> huioi sons εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin are Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

Οὐ <WG3756> Ou vvv γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἐλάβετε <WG2983> elabete you did not receive πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma a spirit δουλείας <WG1397> douleias of slavery πάλιν <WG3825> palin that returns you εἰς <WG1519> eis to φόβον <WG5401> phobon fear , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but ἐλάβετε <WG2983> elabete you received πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma [the] Spirit υἱοθεσίας <WG5206> huiothesias of sonship , ἐν <WG1722> en by ᾧ <WG3739> hō whom κράζομεν <WG2896> krazomen we cry , Ἀββᾶ <WG5> Abba “ Abba ! ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πατήρ <WG3962> Patēr Father ! ”

αὐτὸ <WG846> auto Himself τὸ <WG3588> to The Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit συμμαρτυρεῖ <WG4828> symmartyrei testifies with τῷ <WG3588> tō - πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati spirit ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἐσμὲν <WG1510> esmen we are τέκνα <WG5043> tekna children . Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God’s

εἰ <WG1487> ei if δὲ <WG1161> de And τέκνα <WG5043> tekna [we are] children , καὶ <WG2532> kai then [we are] κληρονόμοι <WG2818> klēronomoi heirs : κληρονόμοι <WG2818> klēronomoi heirs μὲν <WG3303> men - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God συνκληρονόμοι <WG4789> synklēronomoi co-heirs δὲ <WG1161> de and Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou with Christ — εἴπερ <WG1512> eiper if indeed συμπάσχομεν <WG4841> sympaschomen we suffer with [Him] , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv συνδοξασθῶμεν <WG4888> syndoxasthōmen we may also be glorified with [Him] .

Λογίζομαι <WG3049> Logizomai I consider ( Future Glory) γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that οὐκ <WG3756> ouk [are] not ἄξια <WG514> axia comparable τὰ <WG3588> ta [our] παθήματα <WG3804> pathēmata sufferings τοῦ <WG3588> tou - νῦν <WG3568> nyn present καιροῦ <WG2540> kairou . . . πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὴν <WG3588> tēn the μέλλουσαν <WG3195> mellousan that will be δόξαν <WG1391> doxan glory ἀποκαλυφθῆναι <WG601> apokalyphthēnai revealed εἰς <WG1519> eis in ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us .

ἡ <WG3588> hē - γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ἀποκαραδοκία <WG603> apokaradokia in eager expectation τῆς <WG3588> tēs The κτίσεως <WG2937> ktiseōs creation τὴν <WG3588> tēn for the ἀποκάλυψιν <WG602> apokalypsin revelation τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the υἱῶν <WG5207> huiōn sons τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God . ἀπεκδέχεται <WG553> apekdechetai waits

τῇ <WG3588> tē to γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ματαιότητι <WG3153> mataiotēti futility , ἡ <WG3588> hē the κτίσις <WG2937> ktisis creation ὑπετάγη <WG5293> hypetagē was subjected οὐχ <WG3756> ouch not ἑκοῦσα <WG1635> hekousa by its own will , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but διὰ <WG1223> dia because of τὸν <WG3588> ton the [One who] ὑποτάξαντα <WG5293> hypotaxanta subjected [it] , ἐφ’ <WG1909> eph’ in ἑλπίδι <WG1680> helpidi hope

ὅτι* <WG3754> hoti that καὶ <WG2532> kai - αὐτὴ <WG846> autē itself ἡ <WG3588> hē the κτίσις <WG2937> ktisis creation ἐλευθερωθήσεται <WG1659> eleutherōthēsetai will be set free ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τῆς <WG3588> tēs [its] δουλείας <WG1397> douleias bondage τῆς <WG3588> tēs - φθορᾶς <WG5356> phthoras to decay εἰς <WG1519> eis [and brought] into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἐλευθερίαν <WG1657> eleutherian freedom τῆς <WG3588> tēs vvv δόξης <WG1391> doxēs glorious τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the τέκνων <WG5043> teknōn children τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God .

Οἴδαμεν <WG1492> Oidamen We know γὰρ <WG1063> gar - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that πᾶσα <WG3956> pasa whole ἡ <WG3588> hē the κτίσις <WG2937> ktisis creation συστενάζει <WG4959> systenazei has been groaning together καὶ <WG2532> kai - συνωδίνει <WG4944> synōdinei in the pains of childbirth ἄχρι <WG891> achri until τοῦ <WG3588> tou - νῦν <WG3568> nyn the present time .

οὐ <WG3756> ou Not μόνον <WG3440> monon only δέ <WG1161> de that , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but καὶ <WG2532> kai - αὐτοὶ <WG846> autoi ourselves , τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἀπαρχὴν <WG536> aparchēn firstfruits τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit , ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes who have ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we καὶ <WG2532> kai - αὐτοὶ <WG846> autoi inwardly ἐν <WG1722> en . . . ἑαυτοῖς <WG1438> heautois . . . στενάζομεν <WG4727> stenazomen groan υἱοθεσίαν <WG5206> huiothesian [our] adoption as sons , ἀπεκδεχόμενοι <WG553> apekdechomenoi as we wait eagerly for τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἀπολύτρωσιν <WG629> apolytrōsin redemption τοῦ <WG3588> tou - σώματος <WG4983> sōmatos bodies . ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our

τῇ <WG3588> tē in this γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἐλπίδι <WG1680> elpidi hope ἐσώθημεν <WG4982> esōthēmen we were saved ; ἐλπὶς <WG1680> elpis hope δὲ <WG1161> de but βλεπομένη <WG991> blepomenē that is seen οὐκ <WG3756> ouk no ἔστιν <WG1510> estin is ἐλπίς <WG1680> elpis hope [at all] . ὃ <WG3739> ho what γὰρ <WG1063> gar - βλέπει <WG991> blepei he can already see ? τις <WG5101> tis [Who] τί <WG5101> ti . . . ἐλπίζει <WG1679> elpizei hopes for

εἰ <WG1487> ei if δὲ <WG1161> de But ὃ <WG3739> ho what οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv βλέπομεν <WG991> blepomen we do not yet see , ἐλπίζομεν <WG1679> elpizomen we hope for δι’ <WG1223> di’ vvv ὑπομονῆς <WG5281> hypomonēs patiently . ἀπεκδεχόμεθα <WG553> apekdechometha we wait for [it]

Ὡσαύτως <WG5615> Hōsautōs In the same way δὲ <WG1161> de - καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . , τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit συναντιλαμβάνεται <WG4878> synantilambanetai helps us τῇ <WG3588> tē - ἀσθενείᾳ <WG769> astheneia weakness . ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn in our τὸ <WG3588> to - γὰρ <WG1063> gar For τί <WG5101> ti how προσευξώμεθα <WG4336> proseuxōmetha to pray , καθὸ <WG2526> katho vvv δεῖ <WG1163> dei we ought οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἴδαμεν <WG1492> oidamen we do not know ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but αὐτὸ <WG846> auto Himself τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit ὑπερεντυγχάνει <WG5241> hyperentynchanei intercedes [for us] στεναγμοῖς <WG4726> stenagmois with groans ἀλαλήτοις <WG215> alalētois too deep for words .

ὁ <WG3588> ho He who δὲ <WG1161> de And ἐραυνῶν <WG2045> eraunōn searches τὰς <WG3588> tas [our] καρδίας <WG2588> kardias hearts οἶδεν <WG1492> oiden knows τί <WG5101> ti - τὸ <WG3588> to the φρόνημα <WG5427> phronēma mind τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the Πνεύματος <WG4151> Pneumatos Spirit , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to [the will] Θεὸν <WG2316> Theon [of] God . ἐντυγχάνει <WG1793> entynchanei [the Spirit] intercedes ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for ἁγίων <WG40> hagiōn [the] saints

Οἴδαμεν <WG1492> Oidamen we know ( God Works in All Things) δὲ <WG1161> de And ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that τοῖς <WG3588> tois of those who ἀγαπῶσιν <WG25> agapōsin love τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεὸν <WG2316> Theon [Him] , πάντα <WG3956> panta . . . συνεργεῖ <WG4903> synergei works all things together (ὁ <WG3588> ho - θεὸς) <WG2316> theos God εἰς <WG1519> eis for ἀγαθόν <WG18> agathon [the] good τοῖς <WG3588> tois who κατὰ <WG2596> kata according to πρόθεσιν <WG4286> prothesin [His] purpose . κλητοῖς <WG2822> klētois called οὖσιν <WG1510> ousin are

ὅτι <WG3754> hoti For οὓς <WG3739> hous those προέγνω <WG4267> proegnō [God] foreknew , καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv προώρισεν <WG4309> proōrisen He also predestined [to be] συμμόρφους <WG4832> symmorphous conformed to τῆς <WG3588> tēs the εἰκόνος <WG1504> eikonos image τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Υἱοῦ <WG5207> Huiou Son , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His εἰς <WG1519> eis so that τὸ <WG3588> to - εἶναι <WG1510> einai would be αὐτὸν <WG846> auton He πρωτότοκον <WG4416> prōtotokon [the] firstborn ἐν <WG1722> en among πολλοῖς <WG4183> pollois many ἀδελφοῖς <WG80> adelphois brothers .

οὓς <WG3739> hous those δὲ <WG1161> de And προώρισεν <WG4309> proōrisen He predestined , τούτους <WG3778> toutous - καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv ἐκάλεσεν <WG2564> ekalesen He also called ; καὶ <WG2532> kai - οὓς <WG3739> hous [those] ἐκάλεσεν <WG2564> ekalesen He called , τούτους <WG3778> toutous - καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv ἐδικαίωσεν <WG1344> edikaiōsen He [also] justified ; οὓς <WG3739> hous [those] δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐδικαίωσεν <WG1344> edikaiōsen He justified , τούτους <WG3778> toutous - καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv ἐδόξασεν <WG1392> edoxasen He also glorified .
